author: marchhill
content: We've made a change to this EIP since this was recorded so can see the latest version here: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-7793.md

author: marchhill
content: The change introduces a new transaction type for using TXINDEX. It works in basically the same way but this approach is much more flexible and works better with ERC-4337
